name: test Enable Manual Preferred Providers Selection
fullName: /SchedulingOptimizationRegression//Historical Data in Clinic Algorithm//C951299 Preferred client gets scheduled with their most preferred provider#test Enable Manual Preferred Providers Selection
descriptionHtml:
[https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18162](https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18162)

### Update Preferred Providers for Client

The endpoint allows updating the preferred providers for a specific client.

#### Request

- `optimizationC951299NewClient2Id` (path parameter) : The ID of the client for which the preferred providers are being updated.


##### Request Body

The request should include a JSON payload with the following properties:

``` json
{
"useManualPreferredProviders": true,
"preferredProviders": [
{{optimizationC951299NewEmployee1Id}},
{{optimizationC951299NewEmployee1Id}}
]
}

```

#### Response

The response for this request is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
"type": "object",
"properties": {
"preferredProviders": {
"type": "array",
"items": {}
},
"result": {
"type": "string"
},
"failed": {
"type": "boolean"
},
"cachedTime": {
"type": "integer"
}
}
}

```

- `preferredProviders` (array) : An array of preferred providers.

- `result` (string) : The result of the operation.

- `failed` (boolean) : Indicates if the operation failed.

- `cachedTime` (integer) : The time at which the response was cached.


[https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18160](https://centralreach.atlassian.net/browse/CRCH-18160)
